sen.j: また、昭和40年代に教義解釈や宗門の運営、財産問題などを巡り、改革派が主導する宗派内局（当局）と大谷家との間に激しい対立（お東騒動）が生じると、演慧は改革派にも理解を示し、改革派内局のもとで参務（大臣に相当）や式務部長などの要職にも就き、内局と大谷家との調整役を果たしたといわれる。
sen.e: When a clash (Higashi-sodo Strife) over the interpretation of creed, operation of doctrine, and property issue was created between Naikyoku (intra-ministerial bureau) of religious school led by the reform group and the Otani family, Ennei also expressed understanding of the reform group, and held important positions such as Sanmu (equivalent to the minister) and Shikimu-bucho (general manager of the Ceremony Performance Division) in Naikyoku of reform group, and then played a coordinating role between Naikyoku and the Otani family.
sen.cmt: 式務部長→general manager of the Ceremony Performance Division[仮訳です。]
sen.e: When a clash (Higashi-sodo Strife) over the interpretation of creed, operation of doctrine, and property issues, was created between Naikyoku (intra-ministerial bureau) of a religious school led by the reform group and the Otani family, Ennei also expressed understanding of the reform group, and held important positions such as Sanmu (equivalent to the minister) and Shikimu-bucho (general manager of the Ceremony Performance Division) in Naikyoku of the reform group, and then played a coordinating role between Naikyoku and the Otani family.

It is said that when a conflict (Higashi-sodo Strife) occured from 1965 to 1974 between Naikyoku (intra-ministerial bureau) of the religious school led by the reformers and the Otani family over the interpretation of creed, operation of doctrine, and property issues, Ennei exhibited an understanding to the reformers, held important positions such as Sanmu (equivalent to the minister) and Shikimu-bucho (general manager of the Ceremony Performance Division) in Naikyoku of the reformers, and then played a coordinating role between Naikyoku and the Otani family.

sen.j: そして、1993年（平成5年）4月13日、第24世法主（門首）・大谷光暢の逝去により新門であった大谷光輪が門首に就任した。
sen.e: On April 13, 1993, Korin OTANI, new priest, assumed the office of chief priest by reason that Kocho OTANI, the twenty fourth chief priest, passed away.

sen.j: しかし、未成年であった為、同4月17日に演慧は門首代行に就任。
sen.e: However, on April 17 of the same year, Ennei assumed the office of representative chief priest because Korin was under age.

sen.j: また、1996年（平成8年）1月31日、門首であった業成が、父・大谷暢順らとともに宗派からの離脱を宣言し、門首不在となった。
sen.e: On January 13, 1996, as Narishige, chief priest, declared his withdrawal from the religious school with his father, Chojun OTANI, the position of chief priest became vacant.

sen.j: その後も引き続き門首代行に就くことが決められ、同年7月31日に光暢の三男・大谷暢顕が第二十五代門首を継承するまでの間、その任に当たった。
sen.e: As his continued assumption of responsibility as the chief priest was determined, Ennei undertook the responsibility until Choken OTANI, third son of Kocho, succeeded to the twenty fifth chief priest on July 31 of the same year.

sen.j: また、模型飛行機や超軽量動力機（マイクロライト）の世界でも活躍し、関西模型クラブ連合会名誉会長や財団法人日本ラジコン電波安全協会理事、日本マイクロライト航空連盟会長、また鳥人間コンテスト選手権大会の大会役員も務めた。
sen.e: Ennei also played an active role in the worlds of model airplane and ultralight power machinery (microlight plane), and took positions of Honorary Chairman of the Kansai Modelers Club Association (KMA), Director of the Japan Radio Control Safety Association, Chairman of the Japan Microlight Aeronautic League, and Administrator of the Japan International Birdman Rally.
